website_summaries.verdict: Headphones with wired connectivity, easily compatible with latest-technology phones, ipods, and ipads.
pros: This edition features new design on drive unit for improved sound quality
Exceptional materials – aluminum and supple sheep’s leather – used on these headphones makes for a soft, comfortable fit
Remote and microphone supported by most current mobile devices
cons: A few highly attuned purchasers felt there was some compromise in bass sound quality at certain levels

website_summaries.verdict: The Bowers and Wilkins P5 Series 2 has the same winning design of its highly rated predecessor, but now it sounds even better.
pros: The Bowers and Wilkins P5 Series 2 headphones have excellent build quality and rich, well-balanced sound that's now more transparent and accurate
Its earpads are removable and the two included cables are detachable (one has a built-in Apple friendly remote/microphone)
The tight seal shuts out a lot of external noise and the headphones don't leak sound
A protective carrying case is included
cons: leather earpads will cause your ears to get steamy on warmer days
not all remote features will work with Android and Windows devices

website_summaries.verdict: Bowers & Wilkins P5 Series 2 is one of the best-sounding on-ear headphone pairs on the market, and its price reflects that.
pros: Powerful audio performance with deep bass response and excellent detail in the highs
Luxurious, comfortable design with lots of leather

customer_reviews.title: Tickled my senses
customer_reviews.text: I found this headphones really amazing. It is a little pricey but after listening to a few songs on it I think it's worth it. It's built nicely and I heard many sounds on songs that other headphones masked. I don't wear headphones that cover ears for long (as I think the ear gets warm, uncomfortable and start muffling sounds) but this felt good on ears and kept sounds crisp for the 30mins to an hour when I do wear headphones. I am not an audiophile and yes some songs especially older ones might not seem that much different but newer better bit rate digital songs sound awesome.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: ... the P5 series 1 and this series 2 is better. love the product from this company
customer_reviews.text: I own the P5 series 1 and this series 2 is better. love the product from this company, I have small head so no problem but still can't listen with this headphone more than hour because it sitting on my ears. , I use for city travel from home to work. After 2 month the remote cable is not working so I contact b&w for replacement and they stand behind they product so well.they sent me new cable.
customer_reviews.author: Tb tank

customer_reviews.title: Excellent on-ear headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal sound. Quality build. Decent price. Note: They are on-ear, not over-ear, so ambient sound intrudes which, depending upon your use of these, probably is a good thing. They beat Beats and blow away those cheesy earbuds packaged with your iPod. The bass is solid, not punishing. Mid- and high-range is bell-clear.
customer_reviews.author: Ned Leonard

customer_reviews.title: If you can afford them....
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is wonderful, the leather the aluminum and the padded case. Definitely a luxury item and worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Robik

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and quality, but the fit is way too tight.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the sound on this headphone . It was amazing. I also liked the quality of the headphone, the design and the carrying case that was included. Unfortunately, these headphones were way to tight when worn. Wearing these put undo pressure on my TMJ and I experienced pain after using them. If the fit had not been a problem I would have given these a five star rating. I sadly returned the item and went with another headphone that had a more comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: Marnie A

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight, modular headset
customer_reviews.text: Great headset but tight, I used a dvd case to stretch the headset for 24-48 hours; It fits better for me now. The headset sounds better after a few days of usage. I like how the main components of this headset are replaceable.
customer_reviews.author: Silverone

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but not for lengthy listening sessions
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound, quality construction but the on-ear nature of the headphones cause it to clamp hard and result in pain after prolonged listening.
customer_reviews.author: Kinshuk Panda

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: One of the best choices for use with an iPod in this price range.Great bass ,dynamic and highs.High quality New Zealand leather.Replaceable cord and good soft case.
customer_reviews.author: Blonde girl in wedges

customer_reviews.title: An absolute joy to wear and listen to
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic headphones, i tried many portable on-ear headphones and this one is the most comfortable and great sounding headphone i ever owned. This headphone is seriously the new benchmark for any on-ear portable headphones i might consider getting.
customer_reviews.author: Andrei S.

customer_reviews.title: A Quality Experience
customer_reviews.text: A very solid pair of cans. At the moment, the P5s basically set the standard in the on-ear category at this price point. The tonal quality is balanced and neutral, with no bass enhancement. They are exceptionally suited to classical, particularly chamber music. But, frankly, just about anything sounds good. Excellent build quality, quite comfortable for this style of phone. As with all speakers/headphones, you're advised to take them for a test drive first (if that's practical).
customer_reviews.author: J. Parchois

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Great portable headphone. Balanced sound and great build quality. What more could you ask for? The carrying case is a great bonus as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Knight

customer_reviews.title: they are amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Came with a messed up cord. Otherwise, they are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Very very comfortable, and luxurious
customer_reviews.text: Very very comfortable, and luxurious. I wish it was cheaper, but it's B&W! :) Clear, and something I would use to listen to my fave music at night when the going gets tough!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Yong

customer_reviews.title: Close to perfection
customer_reviews.text: All, from the packaging to the pure sound quality is a reflection of the perfection.
customer_reviews.author: JOZEF SENEOR

customer_reviews.title: These are some of the finest headphones I've used
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the finest headphones I've used, even though they're designed for micro uses (like listening to music on a cellphone). Treble is sparkling & clear; bass is round & full. Orchestral music sounds very 'deep' & sonorous, way better than you'd expect from smaller headphones. They're terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Schelin

customer_reviews.title: I loved my S1 pair so much I bought the S2 ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved my S1 pair so much I bought the S2 as well. One lives at work full-time, and the other I keep at home. They're just great. Only pitfall I can see is if you move around a lot, you may prefer a style that fits completely around your ear, as these can slide forward if you bend forward. Overall I find these way more comfortable though, and I wear them at a desk and on planes where that's not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: A Different Name

customer_reviews.title: While sounds from these headphones seems pretty good. Squeaking coming from left side joint between ...
customer_reviews.text: While sounds from these headphones seems pretty good. Squeaking coming from left side joint between diadem and earphone may be really annoying. Not sure if it was this specific headphone (maybe not all have this) but is disappointig for a new product at this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime L

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones! The sound is natural----right balance of lows
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones! The sound is natural----right balance of lows, mids and highs. Need an amp to make them sing. Good purchase. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Smooth As Butter!
customer_reviews.text: Quite possibly the best headphones I have ever heard. Comfortable too! 5 stars for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Camino

customer_reviews.title: B&W surpasses Beats!
customer_reviews.text: Best sounding headphones that I have ever tried on. Quality far surpasses Beats. Not only do they sound good, but they are made out of quality materials such as genuine sheep leather, not plastic. Well worth the money. I am hoping that B&W will come out with a wireless version.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Wickham

customer_reviews.title: Great sound except there is a rattle on the left ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound except there is a rattle on the left side under certain bass frequencies which I am disappointed about.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hyman

customer_reviews.title: Step up your game
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding, crisp and clear sound. Way better than the Bose ear phones. Happy with the P5.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny O

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Top quality headphones. I prefer wireless and over the ear.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R Gabriele

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for a Walkman or Ipod, not so great for an audiophile. No Phono jack?
customer_reviews.author: Terry D.

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Does not live up to expectations based on product reviews. Midrange sounded muffled. Did I get a defective unit?
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product. The headphones are new and never used ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product. The headphones are new and never used as mentioned!! The box was factory sealed. It arrived before time.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget

product_meta.title: Bowers & Wilkins P5 Series 2 On Ear Headphones with HiFi Drivers, Wired, Black
product_meta.description:
P5 Wireless offers all the benefits and features of P5 Series 2 headphones, such as advanced drive unit technology and high-quality, luxurious, materials, but they also include Bluetooth audio streaming.

These headphones have been engineered to deliver a truly revelatory sound experience, thanks to a drive unit design inspired by our Bowers & Wilkins loudspeakers. The drive units work more like Hi-Fi speakers, redesigning the suspension to leave the diaphragm dedicated to sound duties.

High-quality Bluetooth aptX streaming allows Bowers & Wilkins to enter the wireless headphone market with the confidence that whatever your device, P5 Wireless can deliver the best possible sound your device is capable of supplying.

P5 Wireless has a battery life of 17 hours of wireless listening in between charges. If you do run out of charge or want to use P5 Wireless with a cable for any reason we have supplied one in the box.

P5 Wireless have been designed for music on the move. Light, and comfortable and wireless, they deliver pristine sound whenever you want, wherever you are. They even come with their own carry case.
feature_bullets: The latest edition features an all-new drive unit design, while high quality materials ensure a luxuriously comfortable fit..Connectivity Technology: Wired

Highly portable.Apple compatibility:The remote and mic are supported by iPhone 3GS and later, iPod Touch 2nd generation & later, iPad all models. The remote is supported by iPod Classic all models, iPod Nano 4th generation & later, iPod Shuffle 3rd generation & later

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars212 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
